text: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

translation.en.sahih: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].
translation.id.indonesian: Maka pastilah putusan (azab) Tuhan kita menimpa atas kita; sesungguhnya kita akan merasakan (azab itu).
